16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20#include <stdio.h>
21#include <time.h>
22#include <sys/time.h>
23#include <errno.h>
24
25#include <isc/mutex.h>
26#include <isc/util.h>
27#include <isc/print.h>
28#include <isc/strerr.h>
29#include <isc/string.h>
30#include <isc/once.h>
31
32#if ISC_MUTEX_PROFILE
33
34/*@{*/
35/*% Operations on timevals; adapted from FreeBSD's sys/time.h */
36#define timevalclear(tvp) ((tvp)->tv_sec = (tvp)->tv_usec = 0)
37#define timevaladd(vvp, uvp) \
38 do { \
39 (vvp)->tv_sec += (uvp)->tv_sec; \
40 (vvp)->tv_usec += (uvp)->tv_usec; \
41 if ((vvp)->tv_usec >= 1000000) { \
42 (vvp)->tv_sec++; \
43 (vvp)->tv_usec -= 1000000; \
44 } \
45 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
46#define timevalsub(vvp, uvp) \
47 do { \
48 (vvp)->tv_sec -= (uvp)->tv_sec; \
49 (vvp)->tv_usec -= (uvp)->tv_usec; \
50 if ((vvp)->tv_usec < 0) { \
51 (vvp)->tv_sec--; \
52 (vvp)->tv_usec += 1000000; \
53 } \
54 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
55
56/*@}*/
57
58#define ISC_MUTEX_MAX_LOCKERS 32
59
60typedef struct {
61 const char * file;
62 int line;
63 unsigned count;
64 struct timeval locked_total;
65 struct timeval wait_total;
66} isc_mutexlocker_t;
67
68struct isc_mutexstats {
69 const char * file; /*%< File mutex was created in. */
70 int line; /*%< Line mutex was created on. */
71 unsigned count;
72 struct timeval lock_t;
73 struct timeval locked_total;
74 struct timeval wait_total;
75 isc_mutexlocker_t * cur_locker;
76 isc_mutexlocker_t lockers[ISC_MUTEX_MAX_LOCKERS];
77};
78
79#ifndef ISC_MUTEX_PROFTABLESIZE
80#define ISC_MUTEX_PROFTABLESIZE (1024 * 1024)
81#endif
82static isc_mutexstats_t stats[ISC_MUTEX_PROFTABLESIZE];
83static int stats_next = 0;
84static bool stats_init = false;
85static pthread_mutex_t statslock = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
86
87
88void
89isc_mutex_init_profile(isc_mutex_t *mp, const char *file, int line) {
90 int i, err;
91
92 err = pthread_mutex_init(&mp->mutex, NULL);
93 if (err != 0) {
94 strerror_r(err, strbuf, sizeof(strbuf));
95 isc_error_fatal(file, line, "pthread_mutex_init failed: %s", strbuf);
96 }
97
98 RUNTIME_CHECK(pthread_mutex_lock(&statslock) == 0);
99
100 if (stats_init == false)
101 stats_init = true;
102
103 /*
104 * If all statistics entries have been used, give up and trigger an
105 * assertion failure. There would be no other way to deal with this
106 * because we'd like to keep record of all locks for the purpose of
107 * debugging and the number of necessary locks is unpredictable.
108 * If this failure is triggered while debugging, named should be
109 * rebuilt with an increased ISC_MUTEX_PROFTABLESIZE.
110 */
111 RUNTIME_CHECK(stats_next < ISC_MUTEX_PROFTABLESIZE);
112 mp->stats = &stats[stats_next++];
113
114 RUNTIME_CHECK(pthread_mutex_unlock(&statslock) == 0);
115
116 mp->stats->file = file;
117 mp->stats->line = line;
118 mp->stats->count = 0;
119 timevalclear(&mp->stats->locked_total);
120 timevalclear(&mp->stats->wait_total);
121 for (i = 0; i < ISC_MUTEX_MAX_LOCKERS; i++) {
122 mp->stats->lockers[i].file = NULL;
123 mp->stats->lockers[i].line = 0;
124 mp->stats->lockers[i].count = 0;
125 timevalclear(&mp->stats->lockers[i].locked_total);
126 timevalclear(&mp->stats->lockers[i].wait_total);
127 }
128}
129
130isc_result_t
131isc_mutex_lock_profile(isc_mutex_t *mp, const char *file, int line) {
132 struct timeval prelock_t;
133 struct timeval postlock_t;
134 isc_mutexlocker_t *locker = NULL;
135 int i;
136
137 gettimeofday(&prelock_t, NULL);
138
139 if (pthread_mutex_lock(&mp->mutex) != 0)
140 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTED);
141
142 gettimeofday(&postlock_t, NULL);
143 mp->stats->lock_t = postlock_t;
144
145 timevalsub(&postlock_t, &prelock_t);
146
147 mp->stats->count++;
148 timevaladd(&mp->stats->wait_total, &postlock_t);
149
150 for (i = 0; i < ISC_MUTEX_MAX_LOCKERS; i++) {
151 if (mp->stats->lockers[i].file == NULL) {
152 locker = &mp->stats->lockers[i];
153 locker->file = file;
154 locker->line = line;
155 break;
156 } else if (mp->stats->lockers[i].file == file &&
157 mp->stats->lockers[i].line == line) {
158 locker = &mp->stats->lockers[i];
159 break;
160 }
161 }
162
163 if (locker != NULL) {
164 locker->count++;
165 timevaladd(&locker->wait_total, &postlock_t);
166 }
167
168 mp->stats->cur_locker = locker;
169
170 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
171}
172
173isc_result_t
174isc_mutex_unlock_profile(isc_mutex_t *mp, const char *file, int line) {
175 struct timeval unlock_t;
176
177 UNUSED(file);
178 UNUSED(line);
179
180 if (mp->stats->cur_locker != NULL) {
181 gettimeofday(&unlock_t, NULL);
182 timevalsub(&unlock_t, &mp->stats->lock_t);
183 timevaladd(&mp->stats->locked_total, &unlock_t);
184 timevaladd(&mp->stats->cur_locker->locked_total, &unlock_t);
185 mp->stats->cur_locker = NULL;
186 }
187
188 return ((pthread_mutex_unlock((&mp->mutex)) == 0) ? \
189 ISC_R_SUCCESS : ISC_R_UNEXPECTED);
190}
191
192
193void
194isc_mutex_statsprofile(FILE *fp) {
195 isc_mutexlocker_t *locker;
196 int i, j;
197
198 fprintf(fp, "Mutex stats (in us)\n");
199 for (i = 0; i < stats_next; i++) {
200 fprintf(fp, "%-12s %4d: %10u %lu.%06lu %lu.%06lu %5d\n",
201 stats[i].file, stats[i].line, stats[i].count,
202 stats[i].locked_total.tv_sec,
203 stats[i].locked_total.tv_usec,
204 stats[i].wait_total.tv_sec,
205 stats[i].wait_total.tv_usec,
206 i);
207 for (j = 0; j < ISC_MUTEX_MAX_LOCKERS; j++) {
208 locker = &stats[i].lockers[j];
209 if (locker->file == NULL)
210 continue;
211 fprintf(fp, " %-11s %4d: %10u %lu.%06lu %lu.%06lu %5d\n",
212 locker->file, locker->line, locker->count,
213 locker->locked_total.tv_sec,
214 locker->locked_total.tv_usec,
215 locker->wait_total.tv_sec,
216 locker->wait_total.tv_usec,
217 i);
218 }
219 }
220}
221
222#endif /* ISC_MUTEX_PROFILE */
223
224#if ISC_MUTEX_DEBUG && defined(PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK)
225
226static bool errcheck_initialized = false;
227static pthread_mutexattr_t errcheck;
228static isc_once_t once_errcheck = ISC_ONCE_INIT;
229
230static void
231initialize_errcheck(void) {
232 RUNTIME_CHECK(pthread_mutexattr_init(&errcheck) == 0);
233 RUNTIME_CHECK(pthread_mutexattr_settype
234 (&errcheck, PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK) == 0);
235 errcheck_initialized = true;
236}
237
238void
239isc_mutex_init_errcheck(isc_mutex_t *mp) {
240 isc_result_t result;
241 int err;
242
243 result = isc_once_do(&once_errcheck, initialize_errcheck);
244 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
245
246 err = pthread_mutex_init(mp, &errcheck);
247 if (err != 0) {
248 strerror_r(err, strbuf, sizeof(strbuf));
249 isc_error_fatal(file, line, "pthread_mutex_init failed: %s", strbuf);
250 }
251}
252#endif
253
254#if ISC_MUTEX_DEBUG && defined(__NetBSD__) && defined(PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK)
255pthread_mutexattr_t isc__mutex_attrs = {
256 PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK, /* m_type */
257 0 /* m_flags, which appears to be unused. */
258};
259#endif
260
261#if !(ISC_MUTEX_DEBUG && defined(PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK)) && !ISC_MUTEX_PROFILE
262
263#ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP
264static bool attr_initialized = false;
265static pthread_mutexattr_t attr;
266static isc_once_t once_attr = ISC_ONCE_INIT;
267#endif /* HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP */
268
269#ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP
270static void
271initialize_attr(void) {
272 RUNTIME_CHECK(pthread_mutexattr_init(&attr) == 0);
273 RUNTIME_CHECK(pthread_mutexattr_settype
274 (&attr, PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP) == 0);
275 attr_initialized = true;
276}
277#endif /* HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP */
278
279void
280isc__mutex_init(isc_mutex_t *mp, const char *file, unsigned int line) {
281 int err;
282
283#ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP
284 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
285 result = isc_once_do(&once_attr, initialize_attr);
286 RUNTIME_CHECK(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
287
288 err = pthread_mutex_init(mp, &attr);
289#else /* HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP */
290 err = pthread_mutex_init(mp, ISC__MUTEX_ATTRS);
291#endif /* HAVE_PTHREAD_MUTEX_ADAPTIVE_NP */
292 if (err != 0) {
293 char strbuf[ISC_STRERRORSIZE];
294 strerror_r(err, strbuf, sizeof(strbuf));
295 isc_error_fatal(file, line, "pthread_mutex_init failed: %s", strbuf);
296 }
297}
298#endif
